attributes.action: ensure that Ian McCartney MP is investigated by the Police for corruption in respect of allowances.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: McCartney MP is trying to avoid his misuse of allowances being investigated by claiming his health is in jeopardy. Prior to the publication of his expenses, he stated that he was in good health. He is using his local newspaper the Wigan Evening Post to gain sympathey which is undeserved.

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
